headline: JPMorgan Reduces the Firm’s PT on Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) Stock
summary: Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 12, JPMorgan reduced the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $110 from $115, while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. Notably, the firm reduced new leasing estimates for the tower companies ahead of earnings. This […]
